## PDB Statistics

Import our PDB stats CSV file and calculate percent structures by experimental method
```{r}
p <- read.csv("Data Export Summary.csv", row.names = 1)
```

Q1:
```{r}
percent <- p$Total / sum(p$Total) * 100
names(percent) <- row.names(p)
percent
```
